Genre: Psychedelic-Folk,Latin-Rock
Origin: Brazil

An incredible album from the great Brazilian singer who's best known to the world for his work on Milton Nascimento's legendary "Club Da Esquina" album! This record has a more rock-oriented sound that is achieved with help from Beto Guedes, Nelson Angelo, Toninho Horta and Tenorio Jr. The songwriting is amazing and we rank this one up there with the best work by Gilberto Gil and Caetano Veloso from the late 60s and early 70s.
